channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Client Application Access
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Client Application Access

item.title: CVE-2018-1409|2024-09-16T19:20:33.962Z -- ibm -- client%20application%20access
item.description: IBM Notes Diagnostics (IBM Client Application Access and IBM Notes) could allow a local user to execute commands on the system. By crafting a command line sent via the shared memory IPC, which could be tricked into executing an executable chosen by the attacker. IBM X-Force ID: 138708.

item.title: CVE-2018-1410|2024-09-16T17:23:55.401Z -- ibm -- client%20application%20access
item.description: IBM Notes Diagnostics (IBM Client Application Access and IBM Notes) could allow a local user to execute commands on the system. By crafting a command line sent via the shared memory IPC, which could be tricked into executing an executable chosen by the attacker. IBM X-Force ID: 138709.
